content:

### Investigator Notes
- Training log updated for new study coordinator
- EDC data entry backlog cleared, queries resolved
- Cross-site review: statin subgroup ALT out of range at Sites 01, 03, 05, 07, 09, 11; non-statin subgroup within reference range at all sites

### Events
- Drug accountability audit at Site 04: no discrepancies
- IVRS system update deployed, randomization unaffected
- Medical monitor weekly call completed

### Notes
- Week 19: Statin subgroup hepatic enzymes 2-3x ULN across sites. SAE reports under review. Non-statin subgroup within range.
